questions.question: What is InstaMoney (LenDenClub app)?
questions.answer: InstaMoney is LenDenClub’s flagship mobile app for P2P lending and borrowing, offering quick digital loans and investment opportunities in one place.

questions.question: How do I download the app?
questions.answer: Available on Google Play (Android) and App Store (iOS); search ‘LenDenClub’ or ‘InstaMoney’ and install it.

questions.question: How do I sign up as a new user?
questions.answer: Open the app → tap ‘Sign up’ → enter mobile number → receive OTP → verify OTP to proceed.

questions.question: What KYC documents are required?
questions.answer: Aadhaar card and PAN card; also salary slips or bank statements for borrowers.

questions.question: How long does verification take?
questions.answer: KYC is instant; full borrower approval (including income checks) takes minutes to a few hours :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}.

questions.question: Where can I find loan eligibility requirements?
questions.answer: Eligibility criteria include age 21–55, monthly income ≥ ₹12,000, clean credit history, salaried status, Pan + Aadhaar KYC, verified bank account :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}.

questions.question: How do I apply for a loan?
questions.answer: After KYC, select ‘Borrow’ → choose loan amount (₹5k–₹150k) and tenure (3–24 months) → submit documents → wait for approval.

questions.question: How fast is loan disbursement?
questions.answer: Upon approval, disbursal typically happens within 2–4 business days :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}.

questions.question: Can I prepay the loan?
questions.answer: Yes, after 3 months you can prepay without penalty :contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}.

questions.question: How are EMIs collected?
questions.answer: EMIs are auto-debited via bank mandate (UPI/NEFT/ACH) as per EMI schedule.

questions.question: How to register as a lender?
questions.answer: Sign up similarly → verify KYC → link bank account → enable auto-debit mandate → start lending.

questions.question: How can lenders invest?
questions.answer: Two modes: Manual Lending (choose borrowers/terms, min ₹250) or Automated FMPP (₹10k+, portfolio across 100+ loans targeting 10–12% p.a.) :contentReference[oaicite:5]{index=5}.

questions.question: Where do I view my dashboard?
questions.answer: Tap ‘Dashboard’ on the home screen to see active loans, EMIs due, repayments, investments and returns.

questions.question: How do I track repayments?
questions.answer: Dashboard shows upcoming EMIs, repayment history and analytics; lenders see credit-funded list and returns.

questions.question: How secure are the funds?
questions.answer: Funds are held in SEBI-registered escrow accounts managed by ICICI Trusteeship; repayments settled T+1 days after EMI :contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6}.

questions.question: What if I forget my password?
questions.answer: Use ‘Forgot Password’ on sign-in screen → receive OTP → reset your password.

questions.question: How do I get support?
questions.answer: Tap ‘Help & Support’ in app or email loan@lendenclub.com or cs@lendenclub.com; 24/7 support available.

questions.question: Where can I view FAQs?
questions.answer: Open the menu and navigate to ‘FAQs’ or ‘Help Center’ to find detailed answers.

questions.question: How to refer friends?
questions.answer: Tap ‘More’ → select ‘Refer & Earn’, share referral code/links via social or messaging apps :contentReference[oaicite:7]{index=7}.

questions.question: How do I sign in next time?
questions.answer: Open the app → tap ‘Sign in’ → enter your mobile number → receive OTP or use passcode if enabled.

questions.question: Can I set a passcode or biometric login?
questions.answer: Yes, once signed in, go to Settings → enable PIN/biometric login for quicker access.

questions.question: Where can I check loan status?
questions.answer: Under Dashboard → ‘My Loans’, tap each loan to see status, EMI schedule, due dates.

questions.question: How do I update KYC details?
questions.answer: Go to Profile → ‘KYC & Documents’ → update Aadhaar/PAN or income proofs; re-verify as needed.

questions.question: Can I invest via Google Pay?
questions.answer: Yes, select ‘Lend via GPay’ to redirect and complete lending through Google Pay interface.
